attributes.action: School children should be able to wear skinny trousers and trainers
attributes.additional_details: Also some school make girls were school skirts which are inappropriate to boys, but some girls don’t like them so they wear normal black skirts which are even more inappropriate because they are shorter. So if they let girls were non school skirts why can’t we wear skinny trousers
attributes.background: Girls are not aloud to wear skinny trousers, but some of the girls don’t like the baggy school trousers or they look weird on them and people should be aloud to wear trainers because the school shoes don’t look nice with baggy trousers and they break easily.
